Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a ledge cut on the side of Hafnia Gorge for Hafnia Mountain Road.
Room.LongDescription: The Ashton River is in the gorge, so far away it looks like a small blue thread. You are high enough that you see eagles and other birds of prey in the air a long way below you. The gorge is a sheer drop from here to the bottom, and a vertical rock wall is on the other side of you.
